name: Tarun Lalwani
content:
Being diagnosed with Frozen Shoulder in March 2024 felt like a setback, but it turned out to be a blessing in disguise. I initially tried physiotherapy, which focused only on my shoulder, but my real transformation began when I joined Yog Chumbak in July 2024.

Through dedicated one-on-one therapy, I not only regained mobility but also discovered the power of holistic healing & its deeper dimensions. In just four months, I progressed to the Care Batch, and by February 2025, I had recovered 80%. Unlike physiotherapy, yoga strengthened my entire body, bringing balance and well-being beyond just recovery.

I am deeply grateful to Yog Chumbak for guiding me on this journey. It's more than just healing‚Äîit's a way of life.
Yoga illuminated the whole landscape, strengthening not just my shoulder, but every aspect of my being.

name: Anjali Arora
content:
I‚Äôve always been slim, yoga has helped me gain healthy weight and not only improve my strength and flexibility

The teacher here guided me with asanas that suited my body type and gradually increased the intensity in a way that felt natural and comfortable. I never felt rushed or pressured, instead I always felt supported and encouraged to progress at my own pace.

The environment here is peaceful and welcoming, which makes every session something I genuinely look forward to.  Highly recommend Yog Chumbak for anyone looking for a personalised and effective yoga experience!

name: Aishwarya Jhamb
content:
I‚Äôve been attending sessions at Yog Chumbak for a while now, and I can confidently say it‚Äôs one of the best wellness spaces I‚Äôve come across. The instructor is knowledgeable, patient, and genuinely passionate about helping each person on their journey. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or experienced in yoga, the guidance is personalized and uplifting.

The ambiance is peaceful and welcoming, making it the perfect escape from the chaos of daily life. What I appreciate most is their focus on both physical and mental well-being‚Äîit‚Äôs not just exercise, it‚Äôs a holistic experience.

Highly recommended for anyone looking to improve flexibility, reduce stress, and deepen their mind-body connection. Grateful to have found this place!

name: sonika garg
content:
Hello, I was suffering from major cervical spondylosis for over three months. I consulted three different doctors and even tried physiotherapy, but nothing brought lasting relief. Then a friend recommended Yog Chumbak, assuring me that they could truly help.
And that‚Äôs exactly what happened after just five sessions, I experienced an incredible 80% relief from the pain. I genuinely can't thank Ma'am enough for her guidance and healing touch.
Now, I‚Äôm looking forward to continuing this beautiful journey with yoga and deepening my practice.

Grateful beyond words.

name: Mili Chaudhary
content:
I would like to thanks Yog Chumbak for taking very good care of my pains and aches. Once there was a time when I adjusted myself with pains as a part of my life. As I am suffering from fibromyalgia, I have severe pains in several parts of my body. Then  somebody in my known told me about yog chumbak. First day I visited there and give up by saying I can't go there it is far from my home. But my husband convinced me to take trial session. I really went there by a mood to get it reject. But taking just one session changes my mind. And I have joined Yog Chumbak. This Iyengar Yoga really helps me. After taking few sessions I am writing this review. Now I am in a stage where I can think my life without pains. It really helps me a lot. Now when I think of that old days, I just laugh on myself when I agreed my life with pains. Now if someone says "I can't do yoga or I don't have time or anything bla.... bla... bla...."   Then I just says to them that you don't love your self. If you love yourself and wants to live without pains then you can join Iyengar yoga. Iyengar Yoga is a form of yoga which can be done with the help of props. So it is very easy to do yoga for those persons who is in pains.
I really appreciate the efforts done by Yog Chumbak management. There is an individual attention to everyone here.
One more thing I would like to share that I didn't drink water from last 35-36 years. I always drink pepsi instead of water. Daily consumption of my pepsi is about 2.5 litres. But after joining Yog Chumbak, the management here helps me to drink water daily. Although I haven't stopped drinking pepsi. But I have started drinking water 1 or 2 glasses daily.
My heartiest Thanks to Yog Chumbak to change my lifeüòä

name: Anshul Lall
content: I am a full time musician and my work is physically demanding, I had to find a way where I can take care of my lower back pain. After trying multiple other ways to fix it, everything seemed temporary. After joining Yog Chumbak, i got relief from my chronic back pain which i was experiencing for last 2 years & work isn't compromising anymore. Thanks to Yog Chumbak, their experienced Therapists carefully analysed my problem &  their attention to detail while treating me is highly commendable. The centre is clean & has a cosy feel to it.

The instructors are very knowledgeable and while in a group lesson, they offer individual care/instruction to each student whether online or in studio. name: Aanchal
content:
I was suffering from lower back pain, so I decided to go to Yog Chumbak. The yoga instructor (Suman ji) instantly identified the problem - it was due to my incorrect posture. She guided me through a few correctional exercises and told me to incorporate them in my daily routine. I have been religiously practicing them everyday and it has made a huge difference, I don't experience back pain any more.
Suman ji pays a lot of attention to detail, has a positive mindset and makes sure that you recover fully. I am really grateful to her for her guidance and support!

name: ashok agarwal
content: Hi, I am Ashok K Agarwal. I am in legal profession, due to work pressure around 2023, I was facing some health issues like Acidity, High BP, Rounded shoulders etc. On medical advice of doctor, i started focusing on my health & joined Yog Chumbak in Shalimar Bagh. Here, they give more emphasis on alignment of the body & with help of props like ropes , chair, belts, blanket etc. These props make asanas/poses more easy to perform & gives confidence to any age group. Here, I feel better body flexibility & BETTER BODY POSTURE. Grateful! Thanks¬†to¬†Yog¬†Chumbak

name: First Kiran
content:
I have been with Yog Chumbak for 3 months and have benefited immensely with the regular practice. I am based in UK, so was attending the yoga sessions online.
I joined to improve my general flexibility and in particular, my knee pain.  With regular practise of twice a week,  I could feel the benefits and improvement within 3 weeks.
The props recommended were psychological support when doing some stretches which one would not do otherwise without the props.
I have enjoyed learning from Yog Chumbak. Their style of teaching is warm, friendly and yet firm. The instructors understand the postures very well, and can spot reasons for misalignment in postures, in seconds. They are generous with their time and guidance. Their studio is well equipped and spacious. I look forward for continued improvement with their guidance. Best regards,  Arvind

content: Working in marketing means I‚Äôm glued to my laptop for 10-12 hours a day. The result? Constant shoulder tension and brain fog. A friend dragged me to Yog Chumbak‚Äôs evening session once, and I‚Äôve been hooked ever since. Now my shoulders feel light, my posture‚Äôs improved, and surprisingly, I feel more creative at work. Never thought yoga would have this much ROI!

name: Sapna Kakkar
content:
I was in so much back pain from last 3-4 years that all doctors suggested to get surgery done.
One day I decided to get surgery done bcoz I was in so much pain.
Then my daughter suggested me to go to Yog Chumbak to take second opinion.
When I went to here, I could not move my leg or back but in 3 days I was 40-50% better
In 3 months I was 90% better. I am very thankful to yog chumbak for helping me with my problem & now I am living a life free from medicines & surgery without any pain.

name: sarita singh
content:
Mrs. Suman was extremely helpful, humble and knowledgeable as a yoga guru. Practicing with her was extremely beneficial for me, my shoulder pain was completely gone after following her practice for just a month. I have done yoga regularly with different instructors for more than 10 years but my experience with her was the best. The last 2 years that I have attended her classes, I have received a lot of knowledge about yoga and meditation and its impact on the body. I feel a lot more healthy and strong since I started practicing with her.
She is a very motivating yogi and an amazing human being, I would highly recommend her classes.

name: aparna manglani
content:
Yog Chumbak is not just a place for yoga; it's a sanctuary where mind, body, and soul converge in perfect harmony, YogChumbak has been a life-changing sanctuary for me. At 40 years old and struggling with weight, sciatica, varicose veins, diabetes, and migraine, I was advised to incorporate exercise into my routine. Joining Yog Chumbak 2.5 months ago was a turning point. Here at Yog Chumbak, i discovered my knock knees, which was causing imbalance in my body. Since then, I've seen remarkable improvements in my health.

Before YogChumbak, my health was a constant struggle. Even after joining, initially  I struggled with basic asanas even with props,  but now I can perform them with ease with just twice a week classes. Ever since Covid happened, my health deteriorated a lot. Now, in such a short span of time of less than 3 months of consistent yoga classes, i recently achieved a milestone of walking 11,085 steps without any pain, something I couldn't imagine before.

I could have joined many yoga institutes for enjoyment, like those often showcased on social media. However, I chose Yog Chumbak not for enjoyment but for my health. There are plenty of places for enjoyment, but for me, health and wellness were the top priorities. Yog Chumbak has not only transformed my body but also rejuvenated my spirit. I wake up each day feeling refreshed and grateful for this newfound energy and health, all thanks to YogChumbak.

name: Rashi Batra
content:
I was suffering from slipped disc for more than a year, and after my delivery which was a C- Section, i couldn't sleep properly on my side because of immense pain.
After starting with Suman mam's classes, on the first day itself my pain shifted and I could atleast sleep properly at night. Its been more than a month of taking classes from her and not only my pain has reduced manifolds but I feel even more energetic and fit than before.

name: Insha Bhatia
content:
I was struggling with frozen shoulder for past 6 months now, my left arm was absolutely immobile and I couldn't do anything because of the pain.
In suman mam's classes i started doing some asanas with the help of props like ropes and belts ....and miraculously i can move my hand 360 again.
The pain has reduced manifolds.
